p: FO is a better source for n-3 PUFA than KO. However, the bioavailability of n-3 PUFAs from krill oil (mainly PL) is as, or possibly more, efficient as n-3 PUFA from fish oil (TG). This supports the results of a study with krill oil and menhaden oil in humans [ 32]. In addition, the potential function of KO suggests that bioavailability to certain phospholipid-rich regions, such as the brain in the body, may be higher than FO.
